title: Client wont launch at all
body: So, i was playing fine yesterday, no problem at all, went to open it today and LoL client patcher wont even open, just a small warning pop-up that says "PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stoped working" with the only option "close program" to click in. My pc hasnt changed in this few hrs, nor has my internet conection... so wha is it?? classic patch where some 9% of the comunity cant play...can someone who know what is going on tell me what to do? is boring to like a game you cant actualy play

replies.body: This kernel error usually happens when a security setting is preventing the patcher or client from launching.  You should go over the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to help troubleshoot and resolve whatever is causing that block.  Hit me up if you have any questions!
runing it as administrator fixed it, i dont know why it wasnt a trouble in the past. thx anyway, hope i dont get to come back again with questions :3
